channel.title: Random Drops
channel.description: hi, i used [url=http://"http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,97339.0.html"] This guide[/url] and i puted in item id's to be whip, rune plate legs&body, dragon med & fury ammy and it only drops orug bones! so if someone can be so pleased and fix why it only drops orug bones i'd love it.

item.title: Random Drops
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

[quote=“Teeez, post:4, topic:104789”]Ill just type it normaly:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,97339.0.html[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 02:29:19 PM[/size][hr][quote author=I Metal I link=topic=149910.msg1420495#msg1420495 date=1180834151]

hi, i used This guide and i puted in item id’s to be whip, rune plate legs&body, dragon med & fury ammy and it only drops orug bones! so if someone can be so pleased and fix why it only drops orug bones i’d love it.

add this in your item2.java

                           (change Jad to what you want)

[code]public static int Jad[] = {ITEMIDS};

public static int randomJad()
{
	return Jad[(int)(Math.random()*Jad.length)];
}[/code]

add this in the NPChandler.java

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomJad(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
[/quote]

omfg metal i which i could +++ u ! :D[/quote]

theres no need for teh +++ im just helping people as much as i can =]

Read full topic

add this in the NPChandler.java
